description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference: 2019/02351/FUL dated 5th January 2023 for the "Demolition of the existing building and the erection of a replacement five-storey building comprising 36 Affordable Housing units (9 maisonettes and 27 apartments) with private gardens, communal courtyard and cycle storage."  Amendments sought are various alterations including changes to the internal courtyard balustrades from laminated glass to metal bars; mansard changed to flat roof and metal railing replaced with mansafe system; brick recesses depth rationalized; brick headers introduced at curved corners; brick header course introduced above windows (to suit brick soffits); ground floor metal cladding to bin store front (Barton Road) replaced with glazed brick; maisonettes entrance door and glazing details revised; gable end wall on 3rd floor changed to brickwork; and bins enclosure above existing substation removed (individual bins provided to maisonettes on Comeragh Road instead).
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
